name: Zero Visibility
description:
Four friends driving through the mountains. Can't see anything but snow. More lost with every second that passes. Something's out there, lurking in the fog. Something sinister. There's no turning back now. The only way out is through.

Zero Visibility is a chilling cosmic horror game about four friends that get lost in a blizzard.

It's around half an hour long. The game supports both controller and mouse & keyboard (though I recommend controller if you have one). If you run into any bugs let me know in the comments so I can fix them. Have fun! Happy Halloween!
